title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table on Wheels, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table on Wheels
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: Bicycle Wheel / Pneumatic Tires; lower right of image with arrow pointing to small back wheel: wheel 9" Diam.; upper right corner with arrow pointing to top tray: [?] Tray; lower left corner with arrow pointing to front (bicycle) wheel, illegible inscription which continues on verso
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Side view of serving table on wheels with 2 large and one small rectangular shelf; large spoked front wheels and small rear wheels; large "S" shaped steering handle attached at back of lowest tray; vase [?] suggested on middle shelf shelf.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table on Wheels, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-60.
